title: Don't use Cambria for oological works
content:
I think it's more noticeable when the picture's small.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eggs_zoomed_5497.jpg)
  
In case it's not clear:  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eggs_6501.jpg)
  
And [here's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018024102/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/97777721@N00/3551431898/) a larger version without circles.
author: Thomas Levine

comments.content: noticeable dark spots in the general gray of a text.
